summary: Encapsulates the representation of a Python extension module during compilation, coordinating analysis of declarations, resolution of imports, organization of type hierarchies, and the production of all necessary C/C++ source fragments such as type objects, function wrappers, module initialization and cleanup code.
business_intent: Convert highâ€‘level module specifications into compilable C/C++ code that implements a Python extension, handling type definitions, function exports, imports, and runtime initialization to enable seamless integration with the Python interpreter.
